<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BasefaceUISkin" width="480" height="105" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15730bf2ea2"/>
	<e:Image id="image_ditu" width="480" height="82" x="0" y="22" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="buttom_bg" anchorOffsetY="0"/>





	<e:Button id="btn_role" x="15" y="28" width="70" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_role" source.down="buttom_role"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_bag" x="89" y="29" width="72" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_bag" source.down="buttom_bag"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_battle" x="164" y="28" width="73" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_battle" source.down="buttom_battle"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_baozhilin" x="241" y="28" width="72" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_baozhilin" source.down="buttom_baozhilin"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_shop" x="317" y="29" width="72" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_shop" source.down="buttom_shop"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_more" x="392" y="29" width="75" height="76">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="buttom_more" source.down="buttom_more"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CommonSure" width="443" height="288" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="442" height="287" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image width="443" height="288" x="0" y="0" source=""/>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" x="386" y="-34" width="76" height="76">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="commonClose" source.down="commonClose"/>
		<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_sure" label="确定" x="257" y="212" width="135" height="44">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_cancel" label="取消" x="56" y="212" width="135" height="44">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="label_content" text="确定消费100元宝？" x="36" y="72" anchorOffsetX="0" width="379" anchorOffsetY="0" height="126" textAlign="center" size="24" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x9d7b0f" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label id="label_title" text="提  示" x="188" y="6" anchorOffsetX="0" width="83" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" textColor="0xfaf184"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<e:Image width="559" height="95" x="232" y="10" source="frameBarLong_png"/>

	<e:Image width="923" height="2" x="54" y="310" source="create_cutline"/>
	<e:Image width="923" height="2" x="64" y="464" source="create_cutline"/>
	<e:Image width="443" x="215" y="420" height="35" source="create_andi"/>
	<e:Label text="金顶400倍, 阳光顶500倍, 哈顶600倍" x="223" y="424" anchorOffsetX="0" width="431" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="26"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_close" width="76" height="76" x="958" y="0" source="commonClose"/>
</e:Skin>

	<e:Label text="抵制不良游戏，拒绝盗版游戏。注意自我保护，谨防受骗上当。适度游戏益脑，沉迷游戏伤身。合理安排时间，享受健康生活" x="75" y="685" anchorOffsetX="0" width="1120" size="20" fontFamily="KaiTi" stroke="2"/>

    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>

                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
